cause.description:
George Bush sucks for reason I dont feel like typing, our country will suffer for years for his moronic, compulsive, indecisive ideas and leadership, sooo he needs to be out like a set of rims at a puff daddy concert
1. Bush is A horrible leader
2. Bush needs to be impeached
3. His Ideas have ruined America
cause.mission: Gather people thoughts on how Bush sucks and needs to be impeached
cause.name: Impeach Bush
